note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Luaqrcode
body:
### Welcome to Lua QR Code library.

This repository contains one main file: `qrcodelib.lua` that generates the best QR Code for the given string.

You probably only need the files `qrcodelib.lua` and `bit.lua` to use it efficiently.


### Support or Contact
Report bugs at the project page at https://github.com/speedata/luaqrcode or contact gundlach@speedata.
